description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Seizonrenda is a frantic arcade Shoot 'em up with one objective, survive.  Get into the zone with heart pounding music and nerve rattling close calls.  This isn't your parents' asteroid game, so lock and load.  Play through endless waves and climb the high score charts.  Defend the human race against an unknown threat.  Do your part to stop the invasion.
